name: com.tuya.zigbee
description: Adds support for Tuya Zigbee devices to Homey
readme: Tuya Zigbee devices support: TS0121, TS011F, TS0001, TS0011, TS0002, TS0003, TS110F, TS1111, TS130F, TS0203, TS0202, TS0201, TS0601, TS004F, TS0041, TS0505B, TZE200 series, _TZ3000 series, RH3001, RH3040, RH3052
